name: Roger BUEHL, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Paul K. Smeal, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Smithfield and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees

parties: Roger BUEHL, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Paul K. Smeal, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Smithfield and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2014, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
91 A.3d 100
Roger BUEHL, Appellant v. Jeffery A. BEARD, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Paul K. Smeal, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Smithfield and Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 28, 2014.
